channel.title: documentation on Devin
channel.description: Recent content in documentation on Devin

item.title: Scaling docs to 1000+ pages
item.description: In this talk, I explore the lessons we learned from maintaining 1000+ pages with a team of three people, how we (want to) manage 6000+ code snippets, and how we build all these pages in just 16 seconds. Resources Video Slides Presented at May 28, 2019 - JAMstack Paris Meetup

item.title: Scaling with(out) Middleman
item.description: Sarah Dayan and I explain how a revamp of the Algolia documentation required us to move away from the tools we were using, and create a custom static site generator. Resources Video Slides Presented at October 16, 2019 - Search Party: Read The Docs October 29, 2019 - Write The Docs Amsterdam Meetup
